name: Towerface
description:
A 2 player versus game in the style of Towerfall, Nidhogg and Foiled.

Contains 7 varied arenas that play on a random jukebox/arcade style loop.

Two egos battle it out for control! As you gain points and gain the lead, watch as your domination of the field of play grows!

This game is best played with controllers. It's possible for one person to use the keyboard, but probably not both.

Gamepad Controls:
Left Stick = Move
A Button = Jump
X Button = Attack (Attack is directional)

Player 1: Arrows, Z and X
Player 2: I,J,K,L, N and M

Music by @Firkraags
